org.fujion.common

Class CollectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.common.CollectionUtil

  • public class CollectionUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for manipulating collections.

      • indexOfInstance

        public static int indexOfInstance(List<?> list,
                                  Object object)
        Performs a lookup for the exact instance of an object in the list and returns its index, or -1 if not found. This is different from the usual implementation of a list search that uses the object's equals implementation.
        Parameters:
        list - List to search.
        object - Object instance to locate.
        Returns:
        Index of the object.

      • replaceElements

        public static <T> List<T> replaceElements(List<T> dest,
                                          Collection<T> source)
        Replaces the contents of the destination list with that of the source list.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The lists' element type.
        Parameters:
        dest - The destination list. If null, a new list will be created.
        source - The source list. Null is equivalent to an empty list.
        Returns:
        The modified (or newly created) destination list.

      • replaceElements

        public static <T> List<T> replaceElements(List<T> dest,
                                          T... elements)
        Replaces the contents of the destination list with the specified elements.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The lists' element type.
        Parameters:
        dest - The destination list. If null, a new list will be created.
        elements - A list of elements to be copied to the destination list.
        Returns:
        The modified (or newly created) destination list.

      • findMatch

        public static <T> T findMatch(Collection<T> source,
                              Predicate<T> criteria)
        Searches a collection for the first element that matches the specified criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of collection element.
        Parameters:
        source - The collection to search.
        criteria - The criteria for a matching element.
        Returns:
        The matching element, or null if not found.

      • findMatch

        public static <T,I> T findMatch(Collection<T> source,
                                BiPredicate<T,I> criteria,
                                I... items)
        Searches a list of items for the first one that matches an element from the source collection based on the criteria provided, returning the matching element.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of collection element.
        I - The type of item.
        Parameters:
        source - The collection to search.
        criteria - The criteria for a matching element.
        items - The list of items to search.
        Returns:
        The matching element, or null if not found.

      • findMatches

        public static <T> List<T> findMatches(Collection<T> source,
                                      Predicate<T> criteria)
        Searches a collection for the all elements that match the specified criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of collection element.
        Parameters:
        source - The collection to search.
        criteria - The criteria for a matching element.
        Returns:
        The list of matching elements (never null);
